explanation: [0-0] In a room, there is a shelf and a cabinet, both filled with goods. The shot is from a first-person perspective, with a pair of hands holding a frozen bottle of cola with a brand logo printed on it. In the lower left corner, there is an avatar of a bearded man.

[0-3] The hands squeeze the bottle, pushing out the contents. The man in the lower left corner pouts and shakes his head from side to side. The man opens his mouth in a horrifying manner. The camera cuts to a man in a dark gray short-sleeved shirt. The bearded man in the lower left corner continues to shake his head. The man in the dark gray short-sleeved shirt eats the squeezed out substance.
